content: uel | `'number'` | The final reserve fuel required when there is no alternate planning, in kilograms. | | noAlternateFinalReserveFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the final reserve fuel required when there is no alternate planning, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | landingFuel | `'number'` | The amount of fuel remaining on board an aircraft at the moment of landing, in kilograms. | | arrivalFuel | `'number'`. | The amount of fuel remaining on board an aircraft upon arrival at its destination airport, in kilograms. | | possibleExtraFuel | `'number'` | The amount of extra fuel that could potentially be carried, in kilograms. | | maximumFuelCapacityWeight | `'number'` | Maximum weight of fuel the aircraft can carry, in kilograms.| | tankVolume | `'number'` | Total volume of the fuel tank, in liters.| | averageFuelFlow | `'number'`. | The average rate at which an aircraft consumes fuel during a specific phase of flight or over a certain period of time, in kilogram per hour. | | taxiFuelFlow | `'number'` | The rate at which an aircraft consumes fuel while taxiing on the ground, in in kilogram per hour. | | holdingFuelFlow | `'number'` | The rate at which an aircraft consumes fuel while it is in a holding pattern, in in kilogram per hour. | | departureOnBoardFuel | `'number'` | The amount of fuel present in an aircraft's tanks at departure time of a flight, in kilograms. | | arrivalOnBoardFuel | `'number'` | The amount of fuel present in an aircraft's tanks at arrival time during a flight, in kilograms. | | costIndex | `'number'` | The ratio of the operating time costs of an aircraft to the total fuel cost used in the same time period. | | tankeringAdvise | `'string'` | Advice regarding tankering, which refers to the practice of carrying excess fuel from a cheaper location to a more expensive one to save costs. | | tankeringWeight | `'number'` | The amount of additional weight carried due to tankering, in kilograms. | | tankeringProfit |
